enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: On Convention Article 6, the Secretariat introduced relevant documents (FCCC/SBI/2007/17, 22 and 26), and UNEP outlined its activities.
The EU, the GAMBIA, JAPAN, IRAN, SENEGAL, KENYA and others stressed the need for a follow-up to the New Delhi work programme.
Marie Jaudet (France) and Qingchen Chao (China) will chair a contact group.
